fields.summary: Zk connection leak during activeService fail if embedded elector is not curator

comments.body: attached patch closing curator client if it is created by ZKRMStateStore

Thank you [~rohithsharma] for providing patch.

Since AbstractService stops the Service on exception the closeInternal() modification will close the connection created inside the ZKRMStateStore .

Is it possible to add a testcase for the same?
[~bibinchundatt] there are lot of code refactoring happened in ZKRMStateStore. Do you see is this issue is still a valid ?
